title.rendered: Dwell Magazine Inspires Homeowners with Eldorado Stone

content.rendered: Dwell editors chose Eldorado Stone to be featured in its Spring 2013 Special Renovation issue. Inspiring homeowners to indulge in elegant stone cladding, view how the feature showcases the intricate details in Eldorado Stone’s Stacked Stone in Black River, making it the perfect addition to any remodel.
